arm_group.description: Laparoscopic hysterectomy will be done with LigaSure in 15 patients.
Laparoscopic hysterectomy will be done with Halo PKS cutting forceps in 15 patients.
Laparoscopic hysterectomy will be done with EnSeal in 15 patients.

brief_summary.textblock:
There are many instruments with different energy modalities or with different properties
      that are available for use in total laparoscopic hysterectomy. The aim of the present study
      is to compare three of these instruments that are present in our clinic - HALO PKS Cutting
      Forceps, LigaSure and Enseal Tissue Sealer, in total laparoscopic hysterectomy with respect
      to operation time, blood loss, change in hemoglobin / hematocrit levels, perioperative
      complications, return of gastrointestinal activity and hospitalization time.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Perioperative Outcomes of Three Different Instruments in Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  any women with the indication of hysterectomy

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  malignancy

          -  having 3 or more previous abdominal surgeries

          -  uterus being larger than 12 weeks of gestation

          -  patients who must undergo additional surgical procedures during the same operation

facility.name: Adana Numune Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of the Use of LigaSure, Halo PKS Cutting Forceps and Enseal Tissue Sealer in Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy: a Randomised Trial.

overall_official.affiliation: Adana Numune Training and Research Hospital

primary_outcome.description: Perioperative outcomes will be assessed with respect to complication rates, operation time, blood loss, change in hemoglobin and hemotocrit levels, time to return of gastrointestinal function and hospitalization time.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Until 45 patients are operated (6 months anticipated)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Adana Numune Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Adana Numune Training and Research Hospital

lead_sponsor.agency: Adana Numune Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment
